title: Hypothesis Testing
description: Hypothesis testing is a statistical method used to make decisions about the properties of a population based on a sample. It involves formulating a null hypothesis (H0) and an alternative hypothesis (H1), and using a test statistic to determine whether to reject the null hypothesis.

memoryTricks.content: NATPS (Null, Alternative, Test statistic, P-value, Significance level)
Null is no effect, Alternative is the effect, Test statistic is the measure, P-value is the probability, Significance level is the threshold.
Imagine the null hypothesis as the default assumption and the alternative as the challenger.
Chunking: Break down the steps of hypothesis testing into smaller parts.
Method of Loci: Visualize each step of hypothesis testing in different rooms of your house.
Mind Palace: Create a mental palace where each room represents a step in hypothesis testing.
Hypothesis Testing Song: 'Null or Alternative, let's test the hypothesis!'
